title: InfoWars credibility in the U.S. 2017
summary: As of 2017 , right-wing American news website InfoWars was rated as Not_at_all_credible at by 12 % of respondents from a survey of over two thousand InfoWars adults .
Additionally , over half of respondents had either Never_heard_of of the publication or had Heard_of_no_opinion about InfoWars 's credibility .

Conservative view of news media While right-wing websites and online publications have grown in number and popularity in recent years , Fox News remains the largest and perhaps most influential conservative news source in the U.S. .
gold: This timeline presents data on the credibility of InfoWars in the United States as of November 2017 . During a survey , six percent of respondents stated that they found the website very credible .
